issue_name: Buffer Overflow Vulnerability in SICAM AK3 / BC / TM

1.command: Update to V06.02 or later version
1.description: Update the firmware CPCX26 to V06.02 or later version. The firmware CPCX26 V06.02 is present within 'SICAM RTUs AK3 Package' V06.02.

2.command: Update to V10.46 or later version
2.description: Update the firmware ETA4 to V10.46 or later version. The firmware ETA4 V10.46 is present within 'SICAM RTUs AK3 Package' V06.02.

3.command: Update to V03.27 or later version
3.description: Update the firmware ETA5 to V03.27 or later version. The firmware ETA5 V03.27 is present within 'SICAM RTUs AK3 Package' V06.02.

4.command: Update to V06.05 or later version
4.description: Update the firmware PCCX26 to V06.05 or later version. The firmware PCCX26 V06.05 is present within 'SICAM RTUs AK3 Package' V06.02.
